author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on the deprecation of svn_wc_move(), make the metadata_only
feature available via the new in 1.8 svn_client_move7().
do_wc_to_wc_moves): Forward metadata_only by adding arguments.

author: stsp
msg: Degrade cross-wc moves to a copy+delete. We cannot currently track cross-wc
moves, and trying to do so leaves a broken move in the source WC.
(copy_or_move): Add a new optional output parameter move_degraded_to_copy
to let the caller know whether a move had to be degraded. Set this parameter
(svn_wc__move2): If we find that a move has been degraded to a copy, perform
a regular deletion of the move source.

author: mreutegg
msg: OAK-542: MongoMK.getNodes() may return changes from other unmerged branch

author: vinodkv
msg: YARN-253. Fixed container-launch to not fail when there are no local resources to localize. Contributed by Tom White.

author: vinodkv
msg: YARN-253. Fixed container-launch to not fail when there are no local resources to localize. Contributed by Tom White.
